dict.acceptation: 加热器，炉子；加热的人；<美俚>手枪；<美俚>雪茄烟；

sent.orig: Electricity water heater, gas water heater, solar water heater, three grow that well!
sent.trans: 电热水器，燃气热水器，太阳能热水器，三种那种好！

sent.orig: The company camp: Household gas water heater, electricity water heater, gas stove.
sent.trans: 公司主营：家用燃气热水器、电热水器、燃气采暖炉。

sent.orig: Either steam heater or electric heater can be used as required by customers.
sent.trans: 可根据用户的具体情况配用蒸汽加热器或电加热器。

sent.orig: Train cab heater is one heater device for improving the work environment of train driver.
sent.trans: 机车司机室取暖器是为了改善机车司乘人员的工作环境而设计的取暖设备。

sent.orig: The graphite as heater and insulating heater shield in heating vacuum resistance furnace were described.
sent.trans: 论述了在高温真空电阻炉中石墨作为加热体和隔热屏的应用，讨论其性能和结构特点。
